channel.title: [REP++][PI] Adding special to custom weapon
channel.description: Ive tried following several tutorials, done everything exactly the way they describe, but there is still no special bar on my item. I added the case in Itemassistant.java and the special itself in combatassistant.java and dont get any compiler errors. could it be because I used a null code to add the item? :s ive tried everything.

item.title: [REP++][PI] Adding special to custom weapon
item.dc:creator: @Weasey Weasey
item.description:
@Weasey wrote:

…What? It is easy, i’m just not sure why it doesn’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: [REP++][PI] Adding special to custom weapon

item.description:
@whiteghost wrote:

Weasey:

Ive tried following several tutorials, done everything exactly the way they describe, but there is still no special bar on my item. I added the case in Itemassistant.java and the special itself in combatassistant.java and dont get any compiler errors. could it be because I used a null code to add the item? :s ive tried everything.

That’s not going to be easy… Good luck
